text: World Vision International is an ecumenical Christian humanitarian aid, development, and advocacy organization based in California. It was founded in 1950 by Robert Pierce to provide care for children in Korea. In 1975, it started doing emergency and advocacy work. It is active in over 100 countries with a total revenue including grants, product and foreign donations of USD $3.14 billion. ==References== Category:Charities of the United States Category:International organizations
title: World Vision International
